title: Singing Girls, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LRC, in negative: [P 19 SINGING GIR
description: standing young woman wearing a lavender kimono and pale blue and grey plaid obi, looking at her reflection in a mirror; girl holds pink and white flowers; screen with painting of cranes at left
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
